text: Portrait of the artist Carlo Bazzi is a painting by the italian painter Achille Beltrame, made in 1910, that shows the artist Carlo Bazzi.ritratto di Carlo Bazzi (torino 1875 - 1947), Achille Beltrame,General Catalog of Cultural Heritage of the Italian Government, catalog code 0300176242 == Other websites == * * ritratto di Carlo Bazzi (torino 1875 - 1947), Achille Beltrame,General Catalog of Cultural Heritage of the Italian Government ==References== Category:1910s paintings
title: Portrait of the artist Carlo Bazzi (Beltrame)
